name: Dory Blossom Salad
description: This Dory Blossom Salad is a perfect blend for those seeking a healthy yet flavorful meal. Packed with high-protein ingredients and carefully selected vegetables, it's a delicious way to enjoy a meal that's both nutritious and satisfying. Featuring cream dory, colorful peppers, and a unique dragonfruit dressing, this salad is ideal for those following a health-conscious lifestyle.

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the romaine, medium carrot, tomatoes, and extra firm tofu into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the cucumber, yellow and green bell peppers.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and dice the dragonfruit. Set aside to be used in the salad dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Season the cream dory fillet with a pinch of salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium heat, cook the cream dory fillet for 4 minutes on each side or until golden brown and cooked through. Allow it to cool, then flake into pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix the yogurt, cane vinegar, and minced fresh garlic to prepare the dressing. Mash half of the diced dragonfruit and blend it into the dressing for a sweet and tangy flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the chopped and diced vegetables, flaked dory, and the remaining diced dragonfruit. Toss gently.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the dragonfruit yogurt dressing over the salad and toss well to coat all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
